An attack that may
inflict a burn.

inflict a burn.

powerful fire

description.diamond-pearl:

a mystical fire of
great intensity.
It may also leave the
target with a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
